title: Pokemon
summary: Search any pokemon by name or id. Pokémon are the creatures that inhabit the world of the Pokémon games. They can be caught using Pokéballs and trained by battling with other Pokémon. Each Pokémon belongs to a specific species but may take on a variant which makes it differ from other Pokémon of the same species, such as base stats, available abilities and typings. See [Bulbapedia](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_(species)) for greater detail.

name_or_id.description: Provide the name of the Pokémon you want in lowercase or the National Pokédex number.
